title: App Launches
custom_steps:
Launch app → Execute app

[CASE]
App launching screen → Execute app right away
custom_expected: App is running properly

title: Main Page
custom_steps: Execute app
custom_expected:
- App main screen appears properly
- App intro or loading screen appears properly
- In app execution screen, buttons, texts, logos are placed within overscan frame
- Layout and UI appears properly within TV screen.
- Screen ratio fits the device ratio

※ Compare
- Screenshot, Splash Image, UX scenario

title: Reboot
custom_steps:
Execute app → Terminate app → Reboot app

[CASE0 - OS]
1. NetCast
- App launching screen, My Apps, Live TV, HOME Dashboard, Search

2. webOS
- When app is terminated: Launcher Bar, App launching screen, Search
- When app remains on Recent List: Recent List, Launcher Bar, Search

[CASE1 - Remote/HW Key]
1. Execute app → Turn TV power off using Remote/HW Key → TV Power On → Execute app → check movement
2. Execute app → play video content → Turn TV power off using Remote/HW Key → TV Power On → Execute app → Check video content playback

[CASE2 - Plug]
1. Execute app → Unplug → Plugin → TV Power on → Execute app → Check movement
2. Execute app → Play video content → Unplug → Plugin → TV Power on → Execute app → Check movement
custom_expected:
When rebooting app, playback and movement is proper without any error

※ Recent List
webOS: App does not remain on Recent List when rebooting TV (both AC/DC)
webOS2.0: AC Off > Initialize Recent List / DC Off: Remains on Recent List 
webOS3.0: App remains on Recent List when rebooting TV (both AC and DC)

※ Terminate app using EXIT UI Button
NetCast: Move to Live TV of My App 
webOS/webOS2.0: When user moves to Live TV, app should be remaining on Recent List
webOS3.0: When user moves to Live TV, app does not have to remain on Recent List (a concept for memory management)  

※ Video contents should be divided as free/paid contents, and all of them should be checked

※ webOS 
- Should check all ways of execution (both from Recent List and Launcher Bar) 

※ QSM+ supporting platform: Both QSM+ On/Off settings should be checked

title: Return to app screen after advertisement
custom_steps: Execute app → An advertisement which requires entering depth is exposed → Access advertisement → Check whether user can return to app
custom_expected:
User can return to app screen after accessing advertisement

※ Should be able to change back to app by using BACK key, UI button, etc.

title: Resolution
custom_steps: Execute app → Navigate to different menu and screen
custom_expected:
- When changing screen, screen resolution and ratio is proper
- When navigating to different screen, layout and UI are displayed properly 
- Afterimage of playback image appears after changing screen

※ TV Resolution
LG Recomended: 1920x1080 
NetCast: 1280x720 / webOS: 1920x1080

※ TV Ratio: 16:9(Default)

title: Correct Text
custom_steps: Execute app → Check TEXT
custom_expected:
- Text output is proper without typos or broken text
- If app includes UI button or text longer than screen area, text is not cropped, and rolling or ellipsis sign appears
- If list/description contents are longer than screen area, scroll appears properly
- UI Button and text allignment is proper

title: Mouse Over/Focus
custom_steps: Execute app → Put focus on UI Button
custom_expected:
When putting focus on UI button using remote control, mouse over effect appears properly

※ Idle/Focused/Selected States should be distinguished
※ When using navigations key of remote control, focusing on UI button should appear

title: Flickering
custom_steps: Execute app → Access content
custom_expected: Content is not flickering when entering or playing contents

title: Full Size
custom_steps: Execute app → Play video content
custom_expected:
There are no margins around video and video appears in full size

※ Margins can be left if original ratio of content is 4:3
※ OK if user can change to full screen using Q.Menu (Settings)

title: UI Button
custom_steps: Execute app
custom_expected:
All UI buttons of screen works properly

※ Compare to UX scenario submitted to Seller Lounge

title: BACK Button
custom_steps:
Execute app → Select 'BACK' UI Button 

[CASE]
1. Select BACK UI Button in Main screen
2. After entering depth, select BACK UI button
3. Select by using each magic remote cursor and Navigation Key
custom_expected:
Check if BACK UI Button and remote control Back Button is appearing properly and moves to the demand page.

※ BACK button should direct screen to until where user first entered app
※ BACK button function should be included  mandatorily if app only supports NetCast 2.0/Magic remote control (but not on main screen)

※ webOS: Optional/NetCast: Required
If there is UI Back button created by developer, the UI button should function the same as BACK button of remote control

title: EXIT Button
custom_steps: Execute app → Select 'EXIT' UI Button
custom_expected:
When pressing EXIT UI button, app is properly terminated and moves to LIVE TV or the screen where user first tried executing app

※ If launcher bar appears on webOS, it is considered as normal movement 

※ Expected Results
NetCast: App is terminated and move to Live TV or go back to the screen where user tried to execute app
webOS1.0/2.0: Launcher Bar appears
webOS3.0: When pressing EXIT UI button, it is considered as terminating app completely, so app is terminated and does not remain on recent list

※ EXIT UI Button is an option

title: LockUp/LatchUp
custom_steps: Execute app → App function movement
custom_expected: When executing app, lockup or latch, device power turns off

title: Abnormal End
custom_steps: Execute app → App function movement
custom_expected:
App is terminated abnormally

※ Check network environment of apps with network settings set as "Y"
: Check wired/wireless LAN settings, and check once again using static/dynamic IP

title: Keyboard.1
custom_steps: Execute app → Select input window
custom_expected:
When input the Text/Num, check if it appears properly in the input page
※ Transfer to capital/small letter and examine every UI Button in the Virtual Keyboard

※ Check if capital/small letter transfer UI Button is included
(Issue rating: P4)

※ When use the LG Virtual Keyboard, need to check the operation of activated UI Button (ex_Voice Search, </> UI Button, OK...)

[CASE]
1. Check if Text Cursor moves by using <, > UI Button

title: Keyboard.2
custom_steps: Execute app → Select input window
custom_expected:
Check if content in the inputted file is applied properly

ex) If '\' is inputted when '＼' UI Button is clicked in the Virtual Keyboard, it is not operated properly.

title: Keyboard.3
custom_steps: Execute app → Select input window
custom_expected:
Check the operation of UI Button linkage to the TV function in the Virtual Keyboard
ex) Check if Text is inputted by using Voice Search UI Button, when use the LG Virtual Keyboard

title: Terms
custom_steps:
Execute app  → Select Terms

[CASE]
1. Terms appear right after executing app
2. Terms are included when joining membership 
3. Others
custom_expected:
Terms and conditions apprear without error, and Agree/Disagree button works properly

※ Agree: move to next stage
※ Disagree: go back to previous stage

title: Sign Up
custom_steps:
Execute app → Try joining membership

[CASE1 - Information required when joining membership]
1. Try joining membership after filling in all information 
2. Try joining membership after not filling in all information 
3. Try joining membership after filling in unclear information 

[CASE2 - Cancel membership joining process in the middle of procedure]
1. Cancle after filling in all information 
2. Cancel after not filling in all information
3. Try to join membership again and check screen and app movement
custom_expected: Able to join membership without error

title: Sign In
custom_steps:
Execute app → Sign-in

[CASE1 - Does not include ""stay signed-in"" function]
1. Check whether sign-in works properly
2. When executing app, check whether app is signed-out
3. Reboot TV and execute app, and check whether app is in signed-out status

[CASE2 - Includes ""stay signed-in"" function]
1. Sign-in after checking ""Stay signed-in""
1-1. Check whether sign-in works properly
1-2. When re-executing app, check whether sign-in status is maintained 
1-3. Reboot TV and execute app, and check whether app is in signed-in status

[CASE3 -  Do not check ""stay signed-in"" and try signing-in in app]
2-1. Check whether sign-in works properly
2-2. When re-executing app, check whether app is in signed-out status
2-3. Reboot TV and execute app, and check whether app is in signed-out status
custom_expected:
Able to sign-in without error

※ Use account provided by seller or create an account

title: Sign Out
custom_steps: Execute app → Sign in → Sign Out
custom_expected: Able to sign out properly

title: Search
custom_steps:
Execute app → Select search window → Enter search word

[CASE1]
1. Input unclear search word
2. Input clear search word

[CASE2 - Able to change keyboard language]
1. Input search word in a language not supported in app

[CASE3 - Includes autocomplete function]
1. Input search word in a complete word/sentence form
2. Input search word in a incomplete word/sentence form
custom_expected: Search results appear properly on screen

title: Adult Authentication
custom_steps: Execute app → Access adult content → Check adult authentication process
custom_expected:
Adult verification process is included when accessing adult content.
* The adult verification process must be stated in the Comments section and the UX scenario document.
e.g. PIN code method, parental locks, credit card verification process, etc.

- Adult content is approved if an adult verification process is in place
- Pornography content is strictly prohibited

title: Payment.1
custom_steps: Execute app → Purchase content
custom_expected: Content payment works properly

title: Payment.2
custom_steps: Execute app → Check payment method and make payment → Play content
custom_expected:
1) Payment is properly made
2) Purchased contents are listed on purchased contents list and My Page
3) Video/audio output is proper when playing content

title: General Remote Control
custom_steps: Execute app → Press general remote control (TR) key
custom_expected:
Check if it supports general remote control
※ Check entire remote control Key >Check defined operation by Key
※ Check if App goes back to the previous status after the operation of the Key.

title: Magic Remote Control
custom_steps: Execute app → Navigate and execute functions of app using Magic remote control
custom_expected:
Check if it supports magic remote control
※ Check entire remote control Key >Check defined operation by Key
※ Check if App goes back to the previous status after the operation of the Key.

※ Magic Remote Control support is required

title: MMRC/Pointer
custom_steps: Execute app → Move Magic remote control screen cursor (pointer) in app screen
custom_expected: Cursor moves properly in accordance with Magic remote control movement

title: MMRC/OK Key
custom_steps: Execute app → Use Magic remote control → Put pointer over on UI Button → Input OK Key
custom_expected: App moves properly when putting Magic remote control pointer over the UI button and press OK key

title: MMRC/Wheel
custom_steps:
Execute app → Use Magic remote control wheel on Page/List scroll contents

[CASE]
1. Check upper/lower, left/right movrment 
2. If map is included, check zoom in/out function
custom_expected: Magic remote control wheel works properly in page/list scroll contents

title: Navigation Key
custom_steps: Execute app → Press Navigations Key of remote control
custom_expected:
Navigations Key of remote control works properly

※ If OSD button of function key (color key) is supported, navigation key does not have to support focusing movement

title: Function(Color) Key
custom_steps: Execute app → Press function key (color key) of remote control
custom_expected:
Function key (color key) of remote control works properly

※ When UI button is set to match each function key color, check whether the UI button works properly in accordance with each key

title: General/Ok Key
custom_steps: Execute app → Press OK key of remote control
custom_expected: OK key of remote control works properly

title: Support Only MMRC/General/Basic
custom_steps: Execute app → Check HOME, BACK, EXIT, and VOLUME key of general remote control works properly
custom_expected:
HOME, BACK, EXIT, and VOLUME key of general remote control works properly

※ Not on NetCast 2.0 Marmalade app

title: Support Only MMRC/General/No Basic
custom_steps: Execute app → Check if keys other than POWER, HOME, BACK, EXIT, VOLUME of general remote control works properly
custom_expected:
Keys other than POWER, HOME, BACK, EXIT, VOLUME of general remote control works properly

※ NG if other keys than Power, HOME, BACK, EXIT, and VOLUME work
Not on NetCast 2.0 Marmalade app

title: HOME Key
custom_steps: Execute app → Press HOME key of remote control
custom_expected:
HOME key of remote control works properly

※ NetCast: App should move to Home dashboard after terminating
※ webOS: Home Launcher Bar should appear

title: BACK Key
custom_steps:
Execute app → Press BACK key of remote control

[CASE]
1. Main screen → Press BACK key of remote control
2. Enter depth → Press BACK key of remote control
custom_expected:
When pressing BACK key of remote control, app moves properly to previous screen

※ BACK key should direct to where user first entered the app
※ When verifying issue, depth and layer should be distinguished

title: EXIT Key
custom_steps: Execute app → Press EXIT key of remote control
custom_expected:
When pressing EXIT key of remote control, app is properly terminated and moves to Live TV

※ If app is MHP type,
- OK if pop-up appears when terminating app by using EXIT key and EXIT UI button

title: LIVE Key
custom_steps: Execute app → Press LIVE key of remote control
custom_expected:
When pressing LIVE key of remote control, app moves properly to Live TV

※ NetCast: Move to Live TV after terminating app
※ webOS: OK if app moves properly to Live TV (irrelevant whether app is terminated or not)

title: Other Key
custom_steps: Execute app → When running app, press number key or other keys of remote control
custom_expected: When pressing number key or other keys that are not supported in app, app works properly

title: Change Language
custom_preconds: "Change language settings" function is included in app
custom_steps: Check app support language → Execute app → Change language settings
custom_expected: App language settings are properly changed

title: Sound
custom_steps: Execute app → Check sound
custom_expected:
- Sound (BGM, Sound Effect, etc.) is coming out properly
- When sound is coming out, check whether Noise occurs.
- Sound Volume is properly operating
- Sound On/Off function is working properly

※ Refer to BGM/Sound Effect item of UX scenario

title: Play Contents
custom_preconds:
Playback content is included

※ Access Iptime manager page → QoS → Set network speed (to maximum level)
custom_steps:
Execute app → Access random video content → Play content

[CASE1 - Resolution change depending on network status]
1. Network speed 512Kbps → Check content playback 
2. Network speed 1Mbps → Check content playback
3. Network speed 7Mbps → Check content playback
4. Network speed 17.5Mbps → Check content playback
※ Repeat no.1 to no.4 twice with same content 

[CASE2 - IPv6 Verification]
※ Connect IPv6 and check content playback
custom_expected:
Content playback works properly

※ Resolution should change depending on network speed, and buffering should not occur constantly

title: Play Contents/Playback Control/MMRC
custom_steps:
Execute app → Access random video content → Play content → Check Playback Control movement 

[CASE]
1. Each UI button works properly - refer to UX scenario for movement details
2. Each remote control key mapped in UI button works properly
3. UI button and remote key works identically
custom_expected:
- Check if playback control function is working properly
   ->  Check Play, Pause, Stop, Fast Forward, Rewind, Seek, 
        Previous, Next, button
   -> Check Playback Control operation with magic remote 
        control
- Check if content playback in accordance with playback time
- Check the synchronize of Sound and page

※ UI Button: Should be able to access by using navigation key and screen cursor
※ If playback control button is installed on remote control as well, the function should work the same by using remote control
※ If app is MHP type,
- Playback control key of remote control may not work

title: Play Contents/Replay
custom_steps: Start App → Enter random series playback content → Complete playback → Playback content again
custom_expected: After finishing playback of a content, it is possible to replay content

title: Play Contents/Real Time
custom_preconds: Real time streaming is included in app content
custom_steps: Execute app → Access random streaming content
custom_expected:
Realtime streaming works properly without delay

※ Check network environment

title: Play Contents/Subtitle
custom_steps: Execute app → Playback subtitle supporting content → Check subtitles
custom_expected:
Check if subtitles are displayed properly

※ If subtitle settings are available (color, size, brightness, etc.), check if set conditions are applied properly

title: Play Contents/Play Resume
custom_steps: Execute app → Play random content that has playback history → Select "Resume play"
custom_expected: Check "Resume Play" function by selecting content with playback history

title: Contents Resolution
custom_preconds: Resolution supported by content of app
custom_steps: Execute app → Playback content of all available resolutions
custom_expected:
1) SD resolution content video out is normal
2) HD resolution content video out is normal
3) FHD resolution content video out is normal
4) UHD resolution content video out is normal

title: Contents Codec
custom_preconds: Video/Audio codecs supported by content of app
custom_steps: Execute app → Check content playback of all supported codecs
custom_expected: Contents of all codecs playback normally

title: Contents DRM
custom_preconds: DRM method supported by paid content of app
custom_steps: Execute app → Playback DRM-paid content
custom_expected:
All DRM-Paid contents playback normally
1) PlayReady
2) Widevine Classic
3) Widevine Modular
4) Marlin
5) ViewRights
6) FairPlay Streaming

title: Factory Reset
custom_steps: Reset device to factory settings → Execute app → Playback contents
custom_expected: able to access and execute app properly
